channel.title: Hazepk *New* **VPS Hosted** [562]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/k5R8RF7.png[/img] _________________ New Server=Staff positions [b]open[/b]!! ***NOW [b]VPS HOSTED[/b]***
*Online 24/7* *Nex* *Eco/Pk* *High risk Dicing* *We host weekly random events, and give out prizes for them* *Custom items* *WE BROUGHT THEE 'PERFECT' RING BACK, THE RAREST ITEM ON MY SERVER* *Friendliest, most active staff you will ever encounter!!* *Dungeoneering and Summoning 100% operational* *Bosses* *Custom multi-combat zones for clan pking*
Please note: That HazePk is a brand new server, so we do not yet have a webclient.
DOWNLOAD CLIENT LINK : [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!d0YzUYob!_yCs-bmd4EreZAwObMffDSZyy_YdBFco5O09f3U8mLA]https://mega.co.nz/#!d0YzUYob!_yCs-bmd4EreZAwObMffDSZyy_YdBFco5O09f3U8mLA[/url] (Takes seconds, faster game play)
